audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club 99th Annual Spring Concert - 1958 May 10
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).
audio_item.dc.rights.copyright: This recording may be protected by copyright law. Every audio, visual, or textual work has copyright protection unless that protection has expired over time or its creator has placed it in the public domain. audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 12] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : (5 reels) several copies of the same concert. Part 1; Michigan Glee Club performs Laudes Atque Carmina; A Mighty Fortress Is Our God; O Magnum Mysterium; Tobacco; Come Let's Be Merry; Phantasiestucke (Schumann); Prelude in B Flat Major Op.23 Rachmaninoff; Night and Dreams; Let Beauty Awake; The Infinite Shining Heavens; Lord Randall; Great Day; Romance; Love Is Where You Find It; Easy to Love; In the Still of the Night; I'm Gettin' Sentimental Over You; I've Never Benn in Love Before; Ah! Sweet Mystery of Life; Selections by the Friars; (Michigan Songs) Tis of Michigan We Sing; A Toast To Michigan; I Wanna Go Back To Michigan; I'll Ne'er Forget My College Days; Michigan Men; Goddess of the Inland Seas; The Friars Song; The Bum Army; When Night Falls, Dear; Varsity; The Old Friars Song; The Victors; Yellow and Blue.
